result.configuration:
{
      "idField":"type",
      "icon":"appsee-outline",
      "retrieveSourcesOnInit":true,
      "order":400,
      "groupByOptions": {"additionalGroupBy": {"maxSupported": 1}},
      "retrieveSourcesQuery":"query ($start: Int, $count: Int, $searchQuery: String) { snAppseePar { results: appseeParKpis { result values: kpis(start: $start, count: $count, searchQuery: $searchQuery) { id label: name } } } }",
      "retrieveSourcesResultPath":"payload.data.snAppseePar.results.values",
      "getSourceSelectedPayload": "(id, type) => ({ type: id, sourceType: type})",
      "getRetrieveSourcesSearchArgument": "(searchQuery) => searchQuery",
      "dataApiEndpoint":"/api/sn_uxa_req_manager/uxa_data/par",
      "recentSourceMutationName":"recentDynamic",
      "recentSourceMutationArgument":"type",
      "getDefaultConfigurationProps": "({type, api_key, app, childapp, category, predicateComposition, groupByEnabled, trendByEnabled, users, events, orAndStrategy}) => {return {sourceType: 'appsee', type, data: {api_key, app, childapp, category,predicateComposition, groupByEnabled, trendByEnabled, users, events, orAndStrategy}}}",
      "configurationComponentMacroponent":"706c427bc141f137a26c78f3c77006cb", "groupByCustomFieldsMacroponent":"5eab65460a2f7d03a199579f6f999664", "trendByCustomFieldsMacroponent":"e221f2d7cc8b3aeea94322c60a081906",
      "dataCategories": [
      "trend",
      "group",
      "simple"
      ]
      }
result.description: Use the data source to better understand usage and adoption across Service Portal, Mobile Platform, Virtual Agent, and Next Experience.
result.label: User Experience Analytics
result.name: appsee

result.configuration:
{
  "idField": "uuid.indicator",
  "timeZone": "SESSION",
  "icon": "analytics-center-outline",
  "order": 200,
  "isReadOnly": false,
  "useSeriesLabels": false,
  "dataApiEndpoint": "/api/now/par/pardata",
  "retrieveSourcesOnInit": true,
  "retrieveSourcesQuery": "query($start: Int, $count: Int, $searchQuery: String){\n\t\t\tAppPARConfig_Query {\n\t\t\t\tresults: indicators(start: $start, count: $count, nameContains: $searchQuery) {\n\t\t\t\t\tvalues {\n\t\t\t\t\t\tid: sysID\n\t\t\t\t\t\tlabel: name\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\tresult\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}",
  "groupByOptions": {
    "fetchAPI": {
      "query": "GlideRecord_Query {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tpa_breakdowns(queryConditions: $queryConditions) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvalues: _results {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata: _row_data {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tlabel: displayValue\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tid: uniqueValue\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}",
      "requestVariables": {
        "queryConditions": {
          "graphQLType": "String",
          "getValue": "({ groupBys }) => {const groupByIds = groupBys.map((groupBy) => groupBy.field);return `sys_idIN${groupByIds.join(',')}`;}"
        }
      },
      "valuesPath": "data.GlideRecord_Query.pa_breakdowns.values",
      "individualValuePath": "data"
    },
    "additionalGroupBy": {
      "maxSupported": 1
    }
  },
  "sourceDetailsPath": "data.query.indicatorDetails",
  "retrieveSourcesResultPath": "payload.data.AppPARConfig_Query.results.values",
  "getRetrieveSourcesSearchArgument": "(searchQuery) => searchQuery",
  "getSourceSelectedPayload": "(id, type) => ({sourceType: type,uuid: {indicator: id,breakdowns: [],},})",
  "recentSourceMutationName": "recentDynamic",
  "recentSourceMutationArgument": "id",
  "configurationComponent": "sn-par-indicator-configuration",
  "getDefaultConfigurationProps": "({ sourceType, uuid }) => {const hasBreakdown = uuid.breakdowns && uuid.breakdowns.length;return {sourceType,uuid: {...uuid,},previewUuid: {...uuid,},isExpanded: true,isEditMode: !hasBreakdown,};}",
  "temporaryConfigurationProps": [
    "previewUuid",
    "isExpanded",
    "isEditMode"
  ],
  "dataCategories": [
    "trend",
    "group",
    "simple"
  ],
  "preferredVisualizations": [
    "18ac962264404bcc0039359d184b15f3"
  ],
  "sourceType": "java",
  "requestProviderClassName": "com.snc.par.data.service.indicator.providers.IndicatorRequestProvider",
  "dataProviderClassName": "com.snc.par.data.service.PARDataProvider"
}
result.description: Predefined KPIs that show trends and help forecast future events.
result.label: Indicators
result.name: indicator

result.configuration:
{
  "idField": "tableOrViewName",
  "icon": "table-outline",
  "timeZone": "SESSION",
  "order": 100,
  "isReadOnly": false,
  "useSeriesLabels": false,
  "dataApiEndpoint": "/api/now/par/pardata",
  "retrieveSourcesOnInit": true,
  "retrieveSourcesQuery": "query($start: Int, $count: Int, $searchQuery: String) {\n\t\t\tAppPARConfig_Query {\n\t\t\t\tresults: tables(start: $start, count: $count, nameContains: $searchQuery) {\n\t\t\t\t\tvalues {\n\t\t\t\t\t\tid: name\n\t\t\t\t\t\tlabel\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\tresult\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}",
  "sourceDetailsPath": "data.AppPARConfig_Query.tableDetails",
  "retrieveSourcesResultPath": "payload.data.AppPARConfig_Query.results.values",
  "getRetrieveSourcesSearchArgument": "(searchQuery) => searchQuery",
  "getSourceSelectedPayload": "(id, type) => ({sourceType: type,tableOrViewName: id,})",
  "recentSourceMutationName": "recentDynamic",
  "recentSourceMutationArgument": "id",
  "configurationComponent": "sn-par-table-configuration",
  "groupByOptions": {
    "numeric": true,
    "fetchAPI": {
      "query": "AppPARConfig_Query {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tfieldDefinitions(fields: $fields) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvalue {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\ttableName\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tfield {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tlabel\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tid: fullName\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tresult\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tresult\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}",
      "requestVariables": {
        "fields": {
          "graphQLType": "String!",
          "getValue": "({ groupBys, dataSource }) => {const fields = groupBys.map((groupBy) => ({tableName:groupBy.dataSource?.tableOrViewName ||dataSource.tableOrViewName,fieldName: groupBy.field,}));return JSON.stringify(fields);}"
        }
      },
      "valuesPath": "data.AppPARConfig_Query.fieldDefinitions.value",
      "individualValuePath": "field",
      "customPaths": [
        "tableName"
      ]
    }
  },
  "geoMapOptions": {
    "numeric": true
  },
  "getDefaultConfigurationProps": "({tableOrViewName,sourceType,filterQuery,reportSourceSysId,}) => {return {sourceType,tableOrViewName,filterQuery,reportSourceSysId,previewFilterQuery: filterQuery,previewReportSourceSysId: reportSourceSysId,isExpanded: true,isEditMode: !reportSourceSysId && !filterQuery,showCustomConditions: !!filterQuery,};}",
  "temporaryConfigurationProps": [
    "previewFilterQuery",
    "previewReportSourceSysId",
    "isExpanded",
    "isEditMode",
    "showCustomConditions"
  ],
  "dataCategories": [
    "trend",
    "group",
    "simple"
  ],
  "preferredVisualizations": [
    "d24d53f60350de7a652caf3188a46ed2"
  ],
  "sourceType": "java",
  "requestProviderClassName": "com.snc.par.data.service.table.providers.TableRequestProvider",
  "dataProviderClassName": "com.snc.par.data.service.PARDataProvider",
  "requestBucketProviderClassName": "com.snc.par.data.service.table.providers.TableRequestBucketProvider"
}
result.description: Show the current state of your data. You can also add conditions to tables.
result.label: Tables
result.name: table

result.configuration:
{
  "idField": "table",
  "icon": "serverbox-clock-outline",
  "order": 300,
  "isReadOnly": false,
  "useSeriesLabels": true,
  "dataApiEndpoint": "/api/now/v1/metric/ui/ui_builder/data_metricbase",
  "retrieveSourcesOnInit": true,
  "retrieveSourcesQuery": "query($start: Int, $count: Int, $searchQuery: String) {\n     \t\t AppPARConfig_Query {\n\t\t\t\tresults: metricBases(start: $start, count: $count, nameContains: $searchQuery) {\n\t\t\t\tvalues {\n\t\t\t\t\tid: name\n\t\t\t\t\tlabel\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\tresult\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}",
  "groupByOptions": {
    "fetchAPI": {
      "query": "AppPARConfig_Query {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tfieldDefinitions(fields: $fields) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tvalue {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\ttableName\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tfield {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tlabel\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tid: fullName\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tresult\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tresult\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t",
      "requestVariables": {
        "fields": {
          "graphQLType": "String!",
          "getValue": "({ groupBys, dataSource }) => {const fields = groupBys.map((groupBy) => ({tableName: groupBy.dataSource?.table || dataSource.table,fieldName: groupBy.field,}));return JSON.stringify(fields);}"
        }
      },
      "valuesPath": "data.AppPARConfig_Query.fieldDefinitions.value",
      "individualValuePath": "field",
      "customPaths": [
        "tableName"
      ]
    }
  },
  "sourceDetailsPath": "data.AppPARConfig_Query.metricBaseDetails",
  "sourceType": "java",
  "retrieveSourcesResultPath": "payload.data.AppPARConfig_Query.results.values",
  "getRetrieveSourcesSearchArgument": "(searchQuery) => searchQuery",
  "getSourceSelectedPayload": "(id, type) => ({sourceType: type,table: id,})",
  "recentSourceMutationName": "recentDynamic",
  "recentSourceMutationArgument": "id",
  "configurationComponent": "sn-par-table-configuration",
  "getDefaultConfigurationProps": "({ table, sourceType, filterQuery }) => {return {sourceType,table,filterQuery,previewFilterQuery: filterQuery,isExpanded: true,isEditMode: !filterQuery,showCustomConditions: !!filterQuery,};}",
  "temporaryConfigurationProps": [
    "previewFilterQuery",
    "isExpanded",
    "isEditMode",
    "showCustomConditions"
  ],
  "dataCategories": [
    "trend"
  ],
  "preferredVisualizations": [
    "aba8630dc2ccc9b3c1774af1b6820696"
  ]
}
result.description: Visualize time series data for your IoT-based applications that is stored in MetricBase.
result.label: MetricBase
